We help E-Commerce, Retailers and Brands Improve profit opportunities using AI-enabled Demand Predictions and Adaptive pricing.

Learn More

Nextorbit Platform

NextOrbit is a Cloud Based SAAS platform that enables Retailers to strengthen operational decision-making, support high growth and enhance great customer experience using Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

Features

Intelligent Demand Planning

Machine Learning and Human Judgement - we help combine the best of both the worlds.

  • Demand Planning
  • Store Ordering
  • Procurement Recommendations
  • Shelf Space Allocation & Optimisation
  • Intelligent store ordering to enhance sales & Margins.

Intelligent Pricing

Better price realization to improve Sales & Margin.

  • Better product valuation
  • Differential pricing strategies
  • Promotions Recommendations
  • Competitor price monitoring & alerts
  • Markdown recommendations
